mapper.select: select p.*, rp.role_id roleId from sys_permission p left join (select * from sys_role_permission where role_id = #{roleId}) rp on p.id = rp.permission_id where user_enabled=1 order by p.num
select sp.* from usm_admin_role uad inner join sys_role_permission srp on uad.role_id=srp.role_id inner join sys_permission sp on srp.permission_id=sp.id where uad.admin_id=#{sclAdminId}
select p.*, rp.role_id roleId from sys_permission p left join (select * from sys_role_permission where role_id = #{roleId}) rp on p.id = rp.permission_id where sys_enabled=1 order by p.num
